duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and manage operational processes, policies, and infrastructure for learning solutions.
Drive continuous improvement of learning operations in collaboration with peers.
Refine current procedures to maximize efficiency of how learning programs are scheduled, delivered, tracked, and measured.
Manage user adoption efforts for the online learning subscriptions and learning management system (CSOD).
Manage complex scheduling systems and processes.
Manage vendor onboarding, contract renewals, payment scheduling, and Talent Management budgetingprocess.
Identify and track relevant metrics and dashboards to evaluate effectiveness and efficiencies of learning operations.
Develop and oversee communication plan and strategy to market classes, engage targeted audiences, and increase attendance.
Manage day-to-day operations of vendor teams executing services.
Provide support to team members for course registrations, cancellations, and general questions regarding learning at WestRock.
Create campaigns and strategies to drive usage of WRK LEARN and solutions contained within.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree preferred or an equivalent combination of education and experience.
Experience with Cornerstone on Demand learning management system a plus.
Experience with Smartsheet work management platform a plus.
